testcase.name: Payment Page
testcase.system-out: Given Launch MakeMyTrip URL "https://www.makemytrip.com/"...................passed When Enter Departure Place "Mumbai".........................................passed And Enter Destination Place "Delhi".........................................passed And Select Departure Date...................................................passed And Select Return Date......................................................passed And Select No. of Travellers................................................passed And Click Search Button.....................................................passed When Select Flight..........................................................passed And Click BookNow...........................................................passed When Click terms&condition..................................................passed And Click Continue Button...................................................passed When Enter Passenger FirstName "Pooja"......................................passed And Enter Passenger LastName "Bhandari".....................................passed And Click On Gender.........................................................passed When Enter SecondPassenger FirstName "Manni"................................passed And Enter SecondPassenger LastName "Negi"...................................passed And Click On SecondPassengerGender..........................................passed And Enter ContactNo "8527326880"............................................passed And Enter EmailId "pooja100389@gmail.com"...................................passed And Click Continue Button...................................................passed And Click Skip AdOns Button.................................................passed Then Validate Payment Page..................................................passed
